verses.name: Psalms 83:14
verses.text: As the fire burneth a wood, and as the flame setteth the mountains on fire;

verses.name: Psalms 83:15
verses.text: So persecute them with thy tempest, and make them afraid with thy storm.

verses.name: Psalms 83:16
verses.text: Fill their faces with shame; that they may seek thy name, O Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 83:17
verses.text: Let them be confounded and troubled for ever; yea, let them be put to shame, and perish:

verses.name: Psalms 83:18
verses.text: That men may know that thou, whose name alone is Jehovah, art the most high over all the earth.
